subject: Baseball
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Flanagan, a pitcher for Baltimore, won the Cy Young Award as the top pitcher in the American League in 1979. The left-hander had a career record of 167-143 in 18 seasons, pitching mostly for the Baltimore Orioles.
snippet: Mr. Flanagan, a pitcher for Baltimore, won the Cy Young Award as the top pitcher in the American League in 1979. The left-hander had a career record of 167-143 in 18 seasons, pitching mostly for the Baltimore Orioles.
